article.title: EDO Receives Modification for CREW Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: EDO Communications and Countermeasures Systems Incorporated is being awarded a $316.8 million modification to a previously awarded contract for the production and support of 4,501 JCREW 2.1 Radio-Controlled Improvised Explosive Device (RCIED) Electronic Warfare (CREW) systems to meet urgent U.S. Defense Department requirements in support of operation Iraqi Freedom.
